title: The true report of the burnyng of the steple and church of Poules in London
author: Pilkington, James, 1520?-1576.
publisher: At the west ende of Paules Church, at the sygne of the Hedghogge by Wyllyam Seres. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendus solum.,
notes: Running title reads: The true reporte of the burning of Poules.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
